title: Web Portal
desc: Explore, upload, and preview your interactive .fidget widgets directly in the browser.

title: Fidget Creator
desc: Design and export your own .fidget files with images, sounds, and motion. No code needed.

title: Learn
desc: Dive into guides, file format docs, and examples for how Fidgety works under the hood.

title: News
desc: See what’s new with Fidgety—from updates to tutorials and featured creations.

title: GitHub
desc: Browse the source code, submit issues, and contribute via the Fidgety GitHub presence.
